text: Futhi khumbula ngesikhathi sakha indlu (ika’aba) indawo yokuhlanganela abantu nephephile futhi thathani indawo ka-Abrahamu yokuma njengendawo yokwenza umthandazo, futhi senza isivumelwano no-Abrahamu no-Ishmayeli esithi “hlanzelani indlu yami labo abayizungelezayo (tawafu) nalabo abahlala (kuyona) ukuze badumise uMvelinqangi futhi nabakhothamayo bewa ngobuso (bethandaza)
